name: elden-mcp
description: Remote execution of MCP tools through Socket IO

scripts.oidc-server: docker run -p 8080:8080 -v $(pwd)/elden-realm.json:/opt/keycloak/data/import/elden-realm.json -e KC_BOOTSTRAP_ADMIN_USERNAME=admin -e KC_BOOTSTRAP_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:latest start-dev --import-realm

author: Sepehr Laal
